nodes.text: An army under the command of Magistrate Morgan Elsbeth was active on the planet Corvus around the year 9 ABY. Trained by the Galactic Empire's Grand Admiral Thrawn, Elsbeth led her army in the subjugation of the city Calodan, forcing its citizens into destitution. Her soldiers were made up of scout guards who were equipped with A350 blaster rifles, as well as two HK-87 assassin droids. Alongside her hired enforcer Lang, Elsbeth and her army ruled over Calodan until she was overthrown by the former Jedi Ahsoka Tano and the Mandalorian outlaw Din Djarin.
